name: ChokeLive BotTracker
author: Chokeumnuay Khowsakool

sections.description:
Some Feature

*Tracking the GoogleBot visited your site. *Widget for Display the last date/time GoogleBot visited. *Automatically send email once GoggleBot visited your site. *Option to config or change email in setting menu. *Simple config and usable.
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrader, or you can install the plugin manually.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Setting, Chokelive Bottracker and config your E-Mail
  4. Goto Appearance, Widgets and move ‘Chokelive Bottracker’ to sidebar or any where that you need.
  5. Waiting GoogleBot visite your site and check trigger email, [also can see time update at widget as well]

short_description: This pulgin is using for tracking the GoogleBot visited history, and automatic send the trigger to your email.
description:
